name: Tribu (itch)
description:
Tribu is a game where you will have to maintain and prosper a prehistoric tribe in a hostile world full of constant dangers. As a player, you will control the chief of a tribe with whom you will have to do different tasks and activities for the tribe's survival and prosperity.

*The current status of the game is beta, there are still many things to do!

Features :
  • Create your own tribe and its members.
  • Explore the Aurk Valley and discover its mysteries.
  • Collect resources and create different items to increase your chances of survival.
  • Meet other tribes and create an alliance, trade route or assault against them.
Future Updates :
  • More tribes!
  • Tribal skills
  • More locations to discover
